valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Tue 16 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 17 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: New high expected Biscay 1025 by 1800 Tuesday. Low north Forties 985 losing its identity
